summary: A good version of Lex Luthor from a parallel Earth comes to the Justice League's dimension for help to fight their evil counterparts.
cast: William Baldwin|Mark Harmon|Chris Noth|Gina Torres|James Woods|Jonathan Adams|Brian Bloom|Bruce Davison|Josh Keaton|Vanessa Marshall|Nolan North|Freddi Rogers|James Patrick Stuart|Carlos Alazraqui|Richard Green|Jim Meskimen|Andrea Romano|Bruce Timm|Kari Wuhrer|Cedric Yarbrough
title: Liga de la Justicia: Crisis en dos Tierras
